user.canProvide: I'm a first-time founder so if you want to chat about product, sales, ops, or anything else that should be on my mind, I'm always down!
user.greeting: I'll be here working on startups until a ski company sponsors me
user.intro: I am based in Boulder, CO (For now... taking recommendations for my next city) and working on my health-tech startup, Familyfirst!
user.lookingFor: Looking to meet people who I can hang out with and learn from! If you're in the Boulder / Denver, area let's do something cool together outdoors!
